name: Strike Ball 3
description: Strike Ball 3 changes the image of an arcanoid game! Choose the paddle you like, the level of difficulty you prefer and take the challenge! There are no colorful bricks that you should destroy. Here you see the whole landscape picture, the fragments of which you are to move away with your ball. You'll be surprised to find out, that some of them are vivid and live their own life! Keep an eye on the ball and don't let it fall down whatever happens! Be careful and keep in mind, that if it accidently happens, you will lose one life. Strike Ball 3 is full of sudden turns and will never make you bored! Sometimes you'll see helicopters that fly above the playing field and throw off boxes. If you manage to break them, you'll get a bonus! There are lots of them in the game. You may also get some power-ups that help you a lot during the game. For example, there is a chance to double your ball, to get heavy cannon, a fire ball or even a rocket launcher! Above all, you can collect stars and spend them to improve your opportunities! Upgrade Lab is available between levels. Every stage you travel to the new island and have the new mission. Fascinating animation gives the game an excellent spectacular sight. No doubt, Strike Ball 3 will grant you bright minutes. Super-technology soundtrack and life-like sound effects keep you on tenterhooks every second! So, funny pastime is guaranteed! Download this extremely dynamic game right now absolutely for free and enjoy your leisure time!
